title: #93 - Everything You've Wanted to Know about Fertility with Leyla Bilali and Liza Lipov
description:
This week, Maria is talking all about fertility with experts Leyla Bilali and Elizabeth Lipov! She asks many of the questions you might have had about the process, no matter where you are in your dating life. 

Leyla founded her fertility consulting & nursing services business, Fertility Together, to bridge the gap between clinic & patient, between fertility treatment & personalized care. She believes that a nurturing, knowledgeable partner can make all the difference in each individual's unique path to fertility - whether they’re just curious about where they stand & what their options are,  freezing their eggs or going all the way with IVF. Leyla provides personalization, continuity of care, proper education & endless encouragement. 

Elizabeth Lipov has worked as a healthcare tech status that services fertility patients across the country. She worked at a large fertility clinic in NYC for over four years as an IVF (in-vitro fertilization)  coordinator. She worked with couples, single women and oncology patients who were preserving their fertility prior to treatment start. 

Follow Leyla on Instagram http://instagram.com/fertilitytogether

Learn more about Leyla at http://fertilitytogether.com 

Follow Liza on Instagram at http://instagram.com/lizlip23 and http://instagram.com/thefoodiepiece

To learn when Maria will open up the next Ask a Matchmaker Hotline, follow her at http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria

Follow Agape Match on Instagram at http://instagram.com/agapematch

Follow the podcast on Instagram at http://instagram.com/askamatchmaker
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
